page.title: 10Village of Newbie near Annan
page.content: We interviewed Mary Sheldon who has lived at Newbie all her life.These are the{changes}she has noticed : "I was born at Newbie Mains in 1923.The houses in Three Trees Road must be over 100 years old as my grandfather worked at Cochrans (boiler_making factory) for 25 years and left work 3 days before I was born.They built the houses with bricks which were made at Newbie.When I was a girl we used to enjoy the lovely parks which have now been left to grow wild, and the ponds where we used to feed the fish while sitting in the rose garden. I still think Newbie is a nice place to live, but lots could be done to smarten up this village and give us more social help. There is nothing for children or adults to do without going into Annan."
